data.text: @Ricketysponge This was certainly not a middle class sort. Young lad that needed a clip round the ear.

@Ricketysponge Just pay me to yell at people. I may have vented my annoyance rather loudly and when the guy glared at me I was venting about I said I'm talking about him not to him on the tram today. 🤭

May have been in a mood. He had his feet on the seat, and then got up to bang on a window.
@Ricketysponge University put some steel in your spine and iron in your blood. 😉
@Ricketysponge Must bring you great joy to know you are bringing so much misery to others. It would me. 🤣
